    • 方法详细资料

      • compile

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,byte[]> compile​(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                      java.lang.String source)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Compile a Java source file in memory.
        参数:
        fileName - Java file name, e.g. "Test.java"
        source - The source code as String.
        返回:
        The compiled results as Map that contains class name as key, class binary as value.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If compile error.

      • loadClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> loadClass​(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,byte[]> classBytes)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Load class from compiled classes.
        参数:
        name - Full class name.
        classBytes - Compiled results as a Map.
        返回:
        The Class instance.
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If class not found.
        java.io.IOException - If load error.
